name: Donchar
description:
Donchar is a game about life, love, complicity and many more.

HOW TO PLAY

  • ZQSD/WASD: move
  • mouse: look
  • mouse left click: Drag & Drop to move entities
  • E (when requested): listen to a confidence

CREDITS
